Sentencas: A pseudo-transient numerical model is used for the simulation of a multi-functional catalytic plate reactor (CPR).
Titulo: Numerical study of on-board fuel reforming in a catalytic plate reactor for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The work mainly addresses the problems associated with on-board reforming for solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Numerical study of on-board fuel reforming in a catalytic plate reactor for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Heat management is achieved by indirectly coupling partial oxidation with reforming.
Titulo: Numerical study of on-board fuel reforming in a catalytic plate reactor for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Water management is achieved by partially recycling the anode stream from a solid-oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Numerical study of on-board fuel reforming in a catalytic plate reactor for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model uses detailed heterogeneous chemistry for reforming and oxidation reactions occurring on the catalyst beds.
Titulo: Numerical study of on-board fuel reforming in a catalytic plate reactor for solid-oxide fuel cells
